title: When is std::weak_ptr useful?
body:
shared_ptr: holds the real object.

weak_ptr : uses lock to connect to the real owner or returns NULL otherwise.

Roughly, weak_ptr role is similar to the role of housing agency. Without agents, to get a house on rent we may have to check random houses in the city. The agents make sure that we visit only those houses which are still accessible and available for rent.
